message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to come down to $16,000.  This reflects the value of the product and gives you a good deal. Let's see if we can make this happen.
